alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 10 at 6:02AM CDT until May 10 at 10:32PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Moderate severity for the following rivers in Texas... San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge affecting Karnes and Goliad Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Flooding spreads across the wide flood plain upstream and downstream. No structures are threatened. Livestock and farm equipment will need to removed from the floodplain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 31.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:15 AM CDT Wednesday was 31.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 13.7 feet early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 32.2 feet on 11/02/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat San Antonio River Hwy 72 nr Runge 27.0 31.2 Wed 5 am CDT 20.4 16.9 15.3 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 615 PM CDT.
